archimate:TechnologyInterface.name: DKMS Protocol
archimate:TechnologyInterface.documentation: A subset of the Agent-to-Agent Protocol that enables Agents to perform DKMS functions for interoperable digital Wallet management, e.g., key exchange, automated backup, offline recovery, social recovery, etc. See Appendix F.
